column4: great sides. The food remains great
column5: long after the place has been discovered.   it's crowded
column7: but the staff handles crowds well.  Many are the imitators on the north side; this is what they wish they were.  BYOB permitted... but fergawdsakes people
column8: it's BBQ.  If you're gonna BYOB
column9: bring beer.  Not wine.  Not cocktails.  Not wine coolers.  Beer.  Beer.
